data.Name: do_swing_animation

data.Name: launch_power_scale
data.Description: The scale at which the power of the throw increases

data.Name: max_draw_duration

data.Description: The maximum power to launch the throwable item.

data.Description: The minimum duration to draw a throwable item.

data.Name: scale_power_by_draw_duration
data.Description: Whether or not the power of the throw increases with duration charged. When true, The longer you hold, the more power it will have when released.
